abstract: Louisiana Governor-elect John Bel Edwards faces $750 million budget shortfall that must be closed by June.
lead_paragraph: Louisiana’s budget woes are even worse than the incoming administration had anticipated, with an estimated shortfall of up to $750 million that must be closed by the end of June.

headline.main: Louisiana: New Governor Finds Growing Shortfall
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: New Governor Finds Growing Shortfall

snippet: Louisiana’s budget woes are even worse than the incoming administration had anticipated, with an estimated shortfall of up to $750 million that must be closed by the end of June.
